Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Hi, for any object or NPC that you can interact with, you will see a text that appears at the top of the screen. When it is grey, it means you are not close enough to interact with the object or NPC. You will be able to interact when the text is shown as yellow.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Title: Sequence

Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: You did it! Thanks a lot! Now you can proceed to the next room.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Now, can you find a key for me in this room? Once you find it, can you pick it up and pass it to me? Thanks
